description: Three talented young entrepreneurs who are passionate about good food have taken over this historic restaurant and have given it a new lease of life. The cuisine is contemporary and imaginative, with a firm focus on the region. Local cuisine is also to the fore in the simpler and more informal Trattoria da Ciccio.
